paper_abstract: In a recently published paper [Z..-J. Xue, Liu, An optimal result on fault-tolerant cycle-embedding in alternating group graphs, Inform. Process. Lett. 109 (21-22) (2009) 1197-1201], the authors showed that for a set of faulty vertices F in an n-dimensional alternating group graph AG(n), AG(n)-F remains pancyclic if vertical bar F vertical bar <= 2n - 6. However, the proof of the result is flawed. We will prove the theorem again correcting the defects in the previous proof. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on an optimal result on fault-tolerant cycle-embedding in alternating group graphs
